title: Direction of net force on projectile on the way up

content.description: A ball is thrown and follows a parabolic path, as shown above. Air friction is negligible. Point Q is the highest point on the path.
content.question: Which of the following best indicates the direction of the net force on the ball at point P?

choices.label: a diagonal arrow points towards the upper right
a horizontal arrow points to the right
a diagonal arrow points towards the lower right
a vertical arrow points straight down
a diagonal arrow points towards the lower left

content.answer: a vertical arrow points straight down

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
